history.content:
Dear CS intended students,

Welcome again to UC Berkeley!

 

Please review the slidedeck and the video links for more information on the CS Major requirements and enrollment policies. 

 

The slidedeck outlines resources that we recommend to all new students intending to major in computer science and highlights major requirements. Of particular importance from the list are -  subscribing to our CS- intended listserv, EECS 101 Piazza, and HKN tutoring resources; please engage in these resources as they can make a tremendous difference in your experience as you begin your study of Computer Science here at UC Berkeley.

  • GBA for frosh/transfer 2019 slidedeck

 

Also check out the two linked videos. 

  • CS Enrollments - Top 5 Tips for F19 is 12 minutes of department-specific information to help make your enrollment experience easier. 

  • CS Enrollments - Top 5 FAQs is also 12 minutes and provides a more in-depth explanation of some of the enrollment rules for Computer Science.

 

If you have further questions, an advising appointment can be scheduled through Cal Central, or you can also reach us by email at cs-advising@cs.berkeley.edu. If you have enrollment questions, you may email cs-enrollments@cs.berkeley.edu. 

 

At first, being part of the vibrant and growing CS population can be overwhelming, but we are here to help you every step of the way!

 

Best regards,

CS Advising Team
history.subject: CS intended student welcome
